title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 505.10 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 505.10 - Monitoring

State Regulations

Employees and agents of the Office of Mental Health, Commission on Quality of Care and Advocacy for Persons with Disabilities, and
other Federal, State and local agencies responsible for monitoring, inspecting, supervising, and investigating programs operated or certified by the Office of

Mental Health shall have access to confidential HIV information to the extent
necessary to discharge those responsibilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
505.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
